info.description:
# Introduction
  The publicly available read-only Luxor APIs use HTTP GET requests with JSON arguments and JSON responses. 
  Luxor global endpoints do not require Authentication.  Anyone is free to consume the data, however, API pulls are rate-limited. 

  If you are planning to build an app, find bugs or have questions please reach out to us at **hello@luxor.tech**.
info.title: Luxor APIs Documentation

tags.name: Switch
tags.description: Access Luxor Switch live hashprices, pool stats and miner specific data.

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Access Luxor Accounts configuration parameters and data.

tags.name: Catalyst
tags.description: Access Luxor Catalyst transaction and exchange data.

get.summary: Get PPS rates, switching events and uplift data.

time.description: Timestamp of the profit switching event

pps_rate.description: PPS at the time of the switching event

coin.description: Coin ticker. For example, ARRR, ZEC, ZEN or KMD.

pps_value.description: PPS rate in Altcoin minimum unit.

uplift_data.description: Get a timeseries comparsion of the Luxor Switch PPS rate vs a basecoin (ZEC)

valid_share_diff.description: Accepted share difficulty by the pool

invalid_shares.description: Invalid shares submitted to the pool

stale_shares.description: Shares submitted based on an older block

revenue.description: Total balance updates made by the Profit Switcher

currently_mining.description: Coin being mined by the Profit Switcher

region_stats.description: Workers per Stratum Region (Global, US, EU and Asia)

global_stats.description: Time series data of the Profit Switcher Pool Stats

valid_share_diff.description: Accepted share difficulty by the pool

invalid_shares.description: Invalid shares submitted to the pool

stale_shares.description: Shares submitted based on an older block

get.summary: Switch PPS rates comparison against the underlying chains.

parameters.name: coin
parameters.description: The Coin Ticker of the desired pool. For example, BTC, ZEC, ZEN, SC, DCR, etc.

block_subsidy.description: Block reward in the coin minimum unit

total_miners.description: Total amount of miners that submitted at least 1 valid share in the last TBD hours.

total_online.description: Total amount of miners currenlty submitting valid shares to the pool.

valid_shares.description: Total amount of valid shares submitted over the last TBD hours.

invalid_shares.description: Total amount of invalid shares submitted over the last TBD hours.

accepted_shares.description: Total amount of accepted shares by the pool over the last TBD hours.

rejected_shares.description: Total amount of rejected shares by the pool over the last TBD hours.

pending_payouts.description: Outstanding balances to be paid by the pool in the coin base unit.

hashrate.description: Current hashrate being pointed towards the pool.

hashrate_24h.description: Average hashrate pointed towards the pool in the last 24 hours.

height.description: Current block height the pool is attempting to find a valid block solution.

total_kickback.description: Donations made from Luxor's fee to support different projects.

users.description: Top 100 Anonymous miners hashrate stats and their worker's hashing data.

affinity.description: Stratum name to which the worker is connected

parameters.name: coin
parameters.description: The Coin Ticker of the desired pool. For example, BTC, ZEC, ZEN, SC, DCR, etc.

height.description: Height of the block found by Luxor.

hash.description: Hash of the block found by Luxor.

timestamp.description: Timestamp at which the the block was found.

finder.description: Username or address of the miner that found the valid solution for the block.

payout.description: Block reward in the coin base unit.

paid.description: Checks wether the block reward has been paid out to miners.

parameters.name: coin
parameters.description: The Coin Ticker of the desired pool. For example, BTC, ZEC, ZEN, SC, DCR, etc.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The Luxor username or the anonymous miner payout address.

address.description: Address or Username of the miner

balance.description: Outstanding balance of the miner in the coin base unit.

payouts.description: Collection of the last 100 transactions for an address or user including blockchain transactions and catalyst internal transactions.

address.description: This field gets populated with the address of anonymous miner.

username.description: This field gets populated with the Luxor Username of the account miner.

payment_id.description: Payment ID for the anonymous miner address.

amount.description: Payment amount in the coin base unit.

tx_id.description: Transaction ID that can be found in the block explorer if it is not a Catalyst transaction.

time.description: Time in which the transaction was executed.

miners.description: Collection of all the workers associated to the user.

name.description: Name assigned by the user to the worker, usually a single ASIC or GPU rig.

affinity.description: Concatenation of the Stratum name, region and firmware.

minimumStaticDifficulty.description: Minimum statistic difficulty a worker can set.

maximumStaticDifficulty.description: Maximum statistic difficulty a worker can set.

minimumPaymentThreshold.description: Minimum payment threshold an account can set. Units are in the coin base unit.

maximumPaymentThreshold.description: Maximum payment threshold an account can set. Units are in the coin base unit.

baseUnit.description: Base unit definition for the coin.
